Uses of Package
org.openliberty.openaz.pep

Packages that use org.openliberty.openaz.pep
org.openliberty.openaz.pep This package is the OpenAz reference "implementation" of the OpenAz "PepApi interface package", and therefore generally contains implementation classes and only implementation-specific interfaces, also included is a PepApi tutorial that describes the approach to building a PepApi implementation for a specific authorization provider, as well as a 2nd Mapper tutorial that describes the overall approach to writing mappers. 
 

Classes in org.openliberty.openaz.pep used by org.openliberty.openaz.pep
Action
          Action is a specific subtype of RequestAttributes<T>, namely RequestAttributesImpl<AzCategoryIdAction>.
ActionFactory
          ActionFactory creates an instance of AzEntity<AzCategoryIdAction>, which is an AzApi collection that can contain attributes to represent the Action entity in a Xacml Request.
AttributesImpl
          Abstract wrapper for the attributes collections for each entity or response type (Subject, Resource, Action, Environment, Obligation)
Environment
          This class is a non-generic facade for AzEntity
EnvironmentFactory
          EnvironmentFactory creates an instance of AzEntity<AzCategoryIdEnvironment>, which is an AzApi collection that can contain attributes to represent the Environment entity in a Xacml Request.
ObligationFactoryImpl
          ObligationFactory creates an instance of AzEntity<AzCategoryIdObligation>, which is an AzApi collection that can contain attributes to represent the Obligation entity in a Xacml Response.
PepRequestImpl
          A wrapper around the AzRequestContext that implements the PepRequest interface for PDPs that use AzApi to issue requests and process responses.
RequestAttributesFactoryImpl
          A factory to use to create an RequestAttributes that contains one of the underlying AzEntity attribute collections that are contained in the PepRequest.
RequestAttributesImpl
          A wrapper around an authorization provider entity object (subject, action, resource, or environment) that provides a common interface for the setting of its properties which is used by the JavaObjectMapper implementations.
Resource
          This class is a non-generic facade for AzEntity
ResourceFactory
          ResourceFactory creates an instance of AzEntity<AzCategoryIdResource>}, which is an AzApi collection that can contain attributes to represent the Resource entity in a Xacml Request.
ResponseAttributesFactoryImpl
          A factory to use to create an ResponseAttributes that contains the underlying AzEntity obligation attribute collections that are contained in the PepRequest.
ResponseAttributesImpl
          A wrapper around an authorization provider response entity object (obligation)
Subject
          This class is a non-generic facade for AzEntity
SubjectFactory
          SubjectFactory creates an instance of AzEntity<AzCategoryIdSubjectAccess>, which is an AzApi collection that can contain attributes to represent the Subject entity in a Xacml Request.
